Posts.EditableText: I've been using the download version of the quest engine for some time, trying to figure out how to make a text adventure. I have no idea how to code and several times I've hit walls, and needed help to find out what it is I don't understand. But I've never been sure how to ask, and I'm still not. So I'm making this in hopes that some one could help me figure out how to ask for the help I need.
Posts.HTML: I've been using the download version of the quest engine for some time, trying to figure out how to make a text adventure. I have no idea how to code and several times I've hit walls, and needed help to find out what it is I don't understand. But I've never been sure how to ask, and I'm still not. So I'm making this in hopes that some one could help me figure out how to ask for the help I need.

Posts.EditableText:
Go into the main Quest forum (the top one), make a topic with the name of your query; Something like 'How to make a flashlight?', describe what functionality you want and what you're missing or struggling with.

Wait, and people will check in when they can and offer their takes.

The more info you give, the easier it'll be to help you. :)
